name: Clerk of the San Francisco Superior Court - Default Unit
description: The Default Unit processes the following types of Judgments: - UD-possession - UD-Money - Stipulated Judgments - Auto Deficiency - Common Counts- Open Book - Subrogation - Claim & Delivery - Bad Checks - Contracts - Personal Injury- Property Damage - 998 Offer to Compromise - Sister State Judgments - and Confession of Judgment (CCP 1132)
fullDescription: The Default Unit processes the following types of Judgments: - UD-possession - UD-Money - Stipulated Judgments - Auto Deficiency - Common Counts- Open Book - Subrogation - Claim & Delivery - Bad Checks - Contracts - Personal Injury- Property Damage - 998 Offer to Compromise - Sister State Judgments - and Confession of Judgment (CCP 1132)
whatTheyOffer: The Default Unit processes the following types of Judgments: - UD-possession - UD-Money - Stipulated Judgments - Auto Deficiency - Common Counts- Open Book - Subrogation - Claim & Delivery - Bad Checks - Contracts - Personal Injury- Property Damage - 998 Offer to Compromise - Sister State Judgments - and Confession of Judgment (CCP 1132)
